英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S6) - 商务英语词汇 ... stylish 时髦的 stylite 修行的人 stylo 自来水笔.

auth_sentence.content: Stylites, he said, tracks the emergence of the individual, and often the bohemian, as it is seen through fashion.
